item.title: Test
item.author: xxxx
item.description:
kernel

code

# checkpatch
./scripts/checkpatch.pl -f drivers/pwm/pwm-sophgo-sg2042.c --strict

# 需要在venv环境中进行
make O=${BUILD_KDIR} DT_CHECKER_FLAGS=-m dt_binding_check -j96
make O=${BUILD_KDIR} DT_CHECKER_FLAGS=-m W=1 dtbs_check

交叉编译

\[E = mc^2\]

\[ \begin{aligned} KL(\hat{y} || y) &= \sum_{c=1}^{M}\hat{y}_c \log{\frac{\hat{y}_c}{y_c}} \\ JS(\hat{y} || y) &= \frac{1}{2}(KL(y||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2}) + KL(\hat{y}||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2})) \end{aligned} \]

\(sqrt(4) = 2\)

Water (\(H_2O\)) is a critical component.

\[(-1)^S \times F × 2^E\]
